def num_placeable_pies(pie_weights, rack_weights):
    pie_weights = sorted(pie_weights, reverse=True)
    rack_weights = sorted(rack_weights, reverse=True)

    count = 0
    rack_index = 0
    for pie_weight in pie_weights:
        if pie_weight <= rack_weights[rack_index]:
            count += 1
            rack_index += 1
    return count

if __name__ == "__main__":
    num_test_cases = int(raw_input())

        pie_weights = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
